testcase.name: Search weather by valid parameters with GET method

testcase.classname: Search weather by City Name and State code
testcase.name: Verify schemas and data type in response body
testcase.system-out: Given I performed search with valid parameters "London" , "GB" , "b0a9c8b82f8361b93ce4290a8068f35b".passed Then I can get correct response fields......................................passed And get the data in COORD field.............................................passed And get the data in WEATHER field...........................................passed And get the data in BASE field..............................................passed And get the data in MAIN field..............................................passed And get the data in VISIBILITY field........................................passed And get the data in CLOUDS field............................................passed And get the valid country code in SYS field "GB"............................passed When I check data in NAME field.............................................passed Then NAME value should be semilar to the CityName parameter "London"........passed

testcase.classname: Search weather by City Name and State code
testcase.name: Verify schemas and data type in response body 2
testcase.system-out: Given I performed search with valid parameters "New york" , "US" , "b0a9c8b82f8361b93ce4290a8068f35b".passed Then I can get correct response fields......................................passed And get the data in COORD field.............................................passed And get the data in WEATHER field...........................................passed And get the data in BASE field..............................................passed And get the data in MAIN field..............................................passed And get the data in VISIBILITY field........................................passed And get the data in CLOUDS field............................................passed And get the valid country code in SYS field "US"............................passed When I check data in NAME field.............................................passed Then NAME value should be semilar to the CityName parameter "New york"......passed

testcase.classname: Search weather by City Name and State code
testcase.name: Verify response time
testcase.system-out: Given I call the API with parameters "London" , "GB" , "b0a9c8b82f8361b93ce4290a8068f35b".passed Then response time should not exceed "9000" miliseconds.....................passed
